tool.name: EXPANDS
tool.description: Expanding Ploidy and Allele Frequency on Nested Subpopulations (expands) characterizes coexisting subpopulations in a single tumor sample using copy number and allele frequencies derived from exome- or whole genome sequencing input data.
tool.command:
Rscript \$MORINLAB_SCRIPTS/expands_wrapper/run_expands.R $segments $segments_mode $maf $sample_id . --loh $advanced_expands_options.loh --max_score $advanced_expands_options.max_score --precision $advanced_expands_options.precision --cn_style $advanced_expands_options.cn_style --plot_custom #if $plotting_options.genes --genes $plotting_options.genes #end if #if $plotting_options.effects --effects $plotting_options.effects #end if --orderBy $plotting_options.orderBy;
mv ./expands_custom_raw_*.pdf $rawplot; mv ./expands_custom_adj_*.pdf $adjplot; mv ./expands_mutations_*.tsv $snvs; mv ./expands_sps_*.tsv $subpops;

param.name: segments
param.label: Sequenza, Titan, OncoSNP, or IGV-friendly segments file

param.name: segments_mode
param.label: Specify the source of the segments file

param.name: loh
param.label: How should LOH events be handled?
param.option: Include all copy-neutral LOH segments and their BAF in clustering

param.name: max_score
param.label: Upper threshold for noise score of SP detection. Identified SPs with score below this value are.

param.name: precision
param.label: Precision with which subpopulation size is predicted, a small value reflects a high resolution and can lead to a higher number of predicted subpopulations.

param.name: genes
param.label: Label mutations in these genes (provide a file with one gene per line)

param.name: effects
param.label: Select effect criteria to apply to mutations to label

param.name: orderBy
param.label: How should SNVs be ordered on the x-axis?
param.option: By genomic coordinate (chromosome and start position)
